title: 5 promising factors propelling climate action | Gabriel Kra
itunes:author: Gabriel Kra
description: Given the scale of the challenge, the conversation around climate change is often tinged with doom and gloom. But climate tech investor Gabriel Kra thinks we need to reframe the crisis as a source of tremendous opportunity. He offers five big reasons to be optimistic about climate -- starting with the fact that many of the world's best minds are focused and working on building a clean future for all.
itunes:subtitle: 5 promising factors propelling climate action | Gabriel Kra
